solution_line_template: Two more than twice as many oregano plants as basil translates to {oregano_more} + {oregano_multiplier}*{basil_plants} = <<{oregano_more}+{oregano_multiplier}*{basil_plants}={oregano_plants}>>{oregano_plants} oregano plants
All together, Betty's herb garden has {oregano_plants} + {basil_plants} = <<{oregano_plants}+{basil_plants}={total_plants}>>{total_plants} plants.
